name: Die-ablo Survivors
description:
Dia-ablo Survivors

(sorry about the name)

Die-ablo Survivors is a turn-based ARPG where the aim is to collect and upgrade powerups to improve your dice and survive as long as you can!

Basics
  • WASD to roll.
  • The green orbs in the bottom left represent your health, don't lose them!
  • Rolling onto power-ups attaches them to the bottom of your die.
  • Power-ups activate when that die face touches the ground.
  • Power-ups are stronger when attached to higher value die faces. Choose wisely!
Tips if you're having a hard time
  • Take it slow, you have all the time to plan your move.
  • Pick attack power-ups on high value dice faces, and 'support' power-ups on low value die faces.
  • Getting 50 coins (top left in gold) allows you to 'one-up' a face of the die. Upgrade 5 to 6 first.
Power-ups

I recommend playing the game and discovering these yourself before reading here.

Bullet - shoots in more directions for higher value faces.
Lightning - Further range, damage, and arcs at higher values.
Heal - heals more with higher values.
Coin - more coins at higher values, with a big bonus at 6.
Freeze - longer and further freeze at high values, and shatters weak enemies at 6.

HAVE FUN!

Known Issues
  • Game can end suddenly when you die. This is likely because a bullet hit you, but the game ends before the animation can play. I didn't have time to fix this.
  • The game can stutter a bit to begin with, it will go away once everything loads once.
Attributions

  • Made in Godot 3.4.4.
